pages.text:
About Us
Image
Breadcrumb
CityPlace
About Us
About CityPlace
CityPlace is a dynamic experiential neighborhood reimagining contemporary lifestyle as a destination for retail, cuisine, design, world-class art and mixed-use space. Located in the heart of Downtown West Palm Beach, CityPlace presents a thoughtfully curated mix of more than 50 shops and restaurants.
Ambassadors are Here to Help
Located on Level One near the base of The Wishing Tree, our CityPlace Ambassadors offer personal concierge services to enhance your visit. Whether you need restaurant reservations, tailored recommendations for shops or dining, or tips and information on neighborhood happenings and surrounding destinations, our team is here to assist with every detail.
Learn More
Getting to CityPlace
CityPlace is centrally located in Downtown West Palm Beach. If traveling on I-95, take exit 70, or exit 99 on the Turnpike. CityPlace is also adjacent to the high-speed train, Brightline, which offers connections between West Palm, Fort Lauderdale, and Miami.
Learn More
Happening in the Neighborhood
Set your plans this week at CityPlace and experience all the neighborhood has to offer in entertainment, arts & culture, health & beauty, dining and shopping.
Learn More
Community
Related Ross and CityPlace are deeply ingrained in our community. Learn more about our work in West Palm Beach with our neighbors and community partners.
Learn More
Live & Work
CityPlace is a vibrant district where work, community, and the South Florida lifestyle converge. The neighborhood features residential and office developments that continue to shape West Palm Beach’s downtown — from luxury rentals like The Laurel to Class A office towers such as 10 CityPlace and 15 CityPlace.
Learn More
Press & Media
View All
Image
Florida commercial real estate boom fueled by financial and tech executives relocating since pandemic
CityPlace, a neighborhood in West Palm Beach, is expanding by over 125,000 square feet with new retail brands such as Equinox, clothing brands such as Alo and Reformation, high-end makeup retailers like Bluemercury and home retail shops like Crate & Barrel.
Learn More
Image
Harry's is more than celebrity magnet for Taylor Swift, others, it's a father-son success
If the restaurant’s name rings a bell, the West Palm Beach hot spot at CityPlace recently made global news as a downtown date-night dinner destination for Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce.
Learn More
Image
Eataly Coming Soon to West Palm Beach
The South Florida Sun Sentinel highlights new restaurants opening soon in Palm Beach County, including Eataly—the highly acclaimed multifunctional Italian marketplace coming to CityPlace West Palm Beach in Winter 2025-2026.
Learn More
Image
The Future of Transit Launches at CityPlace with MiCa
Guident announced the launch of MiCa, a fully autonomous electric shuttle designed to enhance connectivity and convenience. Running on a 1-mile route, MiCa will link CityPlace, 360 Rosemary, CityPlace Tower, the Brightline, and other key stops.
Learn More
Image
District Fit Community Fitness Festival Returns to West Palm Beach
CityPlace comes alive with the return of District Fit, the annual fitness festival packed with classes for all levels. WPTV's T.A. Walker shines a light on how you can move your body and give back to the community.
Learn More
Image
15 best places to spend New Year's Eve
The Square in West Palm Beach offers shopping, dining, and nightly light shows.
Learn More
Image
‘The Square’ is anything but square
One of West Palm Beach’s most visited neighborhoods, The Square, is offering something for everyone.
Learn More
Image
Dine in support of Rohi’s Readery and Liberation Station
Hilton West Palm Beach will set the scene for a wine dinner, benefiting Rohi’s Readery and Rohi’s Liberation Station, on March 27.
Learn More
Image
Best Christmas events, holiday boat parades, tree lightings in Palm Beach County
With the holiday season now well underway, it's time to spread the joy and the thanks, and practice being extra good (so Santa forgets those trip-ups over the past 11 months). Here are the best events in Palm Beach County to get you in the holiday spirit.
Learn More
Image
The Best Town To Visit At Christmastime in Florida
while the winter weather is flawless, one could conceivably complain that Florida is not the most festive state to visit when the most wonderful time of the year rolls around. But that's not the case in these towns, where the Christmas spirit is alive and well.
Learn More
Image
Culture: October 2022 Arts & Events
Rohi's Readery and The Square will host a Diwali Celebration October 22.
Learn More
Image
Women Building Communities in Palm Beach County
Commissioner Christina Lambert stops by the studio to share how Palm Beach County is honoring International Women's Day
Learn More
Image
Inexpensive workouts and the latest wellness info comes to West Palm Beach with District Fit
District Fit, a wellness festival at the Hilton West Palm Beach and Rosemary Square (formerly CityPlace), includes workouts, culinary events and workshops.
Learn More
View All

Share Your Discovery
Event FAQs
What Types of Events are Held at CityPlace in West Palm Beach?
CityPlace hosts a wide range of events, including live music performances, cultural festivals, art exhibits, fitness classes, holiday celebrations, and culinary experiences.
How Can I Find the Schedule of Upcoming Events at CityPlace?
The event schedule is available on this page, where you can explore details about current and upcoming happenings.
Are There Any Holiday-Specific Events at CityPlace?
Yes, CityPlace frequently celebrates holidays with special events like seasonal light shows, nightly snowfalls during the holiday season, and festive gatherings such as menorah lightings and live music.
Are Events at CityPlace free or do they require tickets?
Many events at CityPlace are free and open to the public, such as outdoor performances and community celebrations. Some events, like culinary classes or ticketed shows, may require payment or reservations.
Does Cityplace Host Family-Friendly Events?
Yes, CityPlace offers plenty of family-friendly activities, including seasonal festivals, art fairs, and holiday-themed events designed for all ages.

Haute Summer Deals at Hilton West Palm Beach
Haute Summer Deals at Hilton West Palm Beach
Hilton West Palm Beach is offering a variety of summer specials now through September 30, 2025.
Hilton West Palm Beach Happenings
Soak up the sun and savor the season with summer-exclusive offers, new dining, family fun, and more.
Whether you're visiting from out of town or enjoying a staycation,
Hilton West Palm Beach
invites you to recharge and reconnect with a full lineup of seasonal experiences and signature offerings,
available now through September 30, 2025
.
Special Offers
Sunkissed Savings:
Save up to 25% when booking at least 7 days in advance.
Florida Resident Rate:
Florida residents receive up to 15% off the standard room rate with valid I.D.
Experience the Stay:
Includes a $50 daily credit to use on-property, premium Wi-Fi, and early check-in/late check-out (based on availability).
Hilton Honors Perks:
Hilton Honors members enjoy exclusive discounts, flexible booking with points, and more.
Book Your Stay Today
DINING
Now Open:
Moody Tongue Sushi
Michelin Guide-Recommended Moody Tongue Sushi is now open at Hilton West Palm Beach—bringing innovative, seasonal sushi and craft beer pairings to downtown.
Galley at Hilton West Palm Beach
Happy Hour:
Daily from 4–6pm and 10-11pm
Dine for a Cause
:
Every Thursday, 10% of proceeds are donated to a charitable organization of the month
Explore Hilton's Dining Options
ResortPass & Family Fun
Hilton West Palm Beach has expanded its
ResortPass
offerings for locals and visitors alike, including:
Weekday Family ResortPass: All-day pool access for a family of four at a discounted rate
Discounted ResortPasses for Florida educators
Games & activities on La Playa Lawn
Upgraded menu at La Playa Poolside Lounge
ResortPass Highlights
Day Pass:
From $25 adult / $15 child
Lazy Sundays Pass:
From $40 adult / $20 child
Cabanas:
From $250 for 6 guests
Double Cabanas:
From $450 for 12 guests
All passes include pool access, lounge chairs (first-come, first-served and not guaranteed), towel service, lawn games, complimentary Wi-Fi, valet parking available for a fee, and poolside dining options available from La Playa.
Book a ResortPass
Weekend Pool Programming
Poolside Sessions:
Saturdays | 12–4pm | DJ Series
Lazy Sundays:
Sundays | 1–5pm | Curated DJ Series by Giant Step
Upgraded menu at the
La Playa
poolside lounge
Fitness & Wellness
Get active on the lawn with weekly outdoor wellness classes, free for hotel guests and open to the public (fees vary).
Sculpt & Sweat with Cloe Mimun
– Saturdays, 9-9:45am
Sunrise Yoga with 1Fitness
– Sundays, 8–9am
Changing Frequencies: A Sound Healing Class
– Third Thursday of the month, 8-9pm
Mermaid Classes
– June 21, 2025 from 10:55-11:55am or 12-1pm
Full Moon Yoga with Brit Lukas
– Monthly (dates vary) from 8-9pm
Surfer's Shred with Built by Boltz
– Every other Friday from 9-10am
All skill levels welcome. You can bring your own mat or use the ones provided.
View full fitness schedule
Hotel Guest Perks
Every stay includes:
One-hour bike rental for two
Two beach chairs + towels
Access to all fitness classes
Movie nights and electric shuttle rides to the beach, cultural spots, and CityPlace
Hilton West Palm Beach
600 Okeechobee Blvd., West Palm Beach, FL
hiltonwestpalmbeach.com
| (561) 231-6000
